Exist alternative explanation: There could be alternative explanations for the presence of the man wearing a t-shirt with the slogan "अबकि बार 65 पार" (Beyond 65 this time) in the video. Contradict fact: No clear contradiction of facts is evident in the provided claim and expert's verdict.
